answers.answer: I dont know if you should be concerened but since I have been 23 weeks my heart rate has been 120 and higher... sometimes this could be just the regular you run on.. but one thing high pulse can show is you being anemic... I am on iron tablets now and my pulse has gone down. Maybe ur doc should do some blood tests but not too sure.. its strange that ur heart rate has suddenly gone high.. the same as you my blood pressure is fine.. hmm hope ur ok I have also been tested for blood clots in my lungs because of the heart rate xx

Well my heart rate never runs high always low.. Which is concerning. We've done blood work but it was for liver and kidney function =\ lol. Good lord I've had an uneventful pregnancy and now it wants to mess up..  I see him next week and I will be monitoring it often because I'm way too concerned

question: So I'm 34+1 and the past week I've been tested for preeclampsia and protein what not.. And my doctor told me to check my bp daily at home. So today I felt real oh weird as if my heart was racing.. Note in hadn't done anything but have something to eat and watch some TV. My heart rate was 126!! Is this normal?? My blood pressure was 135/85 though so not too high but right below what he says not to be at.  Should I he concerned?
title: Blood pressure and Heart rate?
